data.comment: Language name in English

data.comment: Language name in your language

data.name: SystemUserName

data.name: InformationText

data.comment: The title of the popup message when a question is displayed\nex. Would you like to turn off league searcher, when the user wants to host/join a game

data.name: OKText
data.comment: The content of the OK button of the popup message

data.name: YesText

data.name: NoText

data.name: MessageLogsText
data.comment: Message logs label in the dropdown menu

data.comment: Settings label in the dropdown menu

data.name: ExitText
data.comment: Exit label in the dropdown menu

data.name: ServerText
data.comment: Server label in the login window

data.name: QuestionMark
data.comment: Question mark after ServerText

data.name: ServerInfoText
data.value: The official server is: wormnet1.team17.com, you can find there all the players. But sometimes it is not accessable due to maintenance. Then you can use an alternative server to play for that short time.
data.comment: The text of the popup message when you click the "?" after ServerText in the login window

data.name: ServerListEditorTitle
data.comment: The title of the server list editor window when you click that little button near the server dropdown menu in the login window

data.name: AutoLoginText
data.comment: Auto login label in the login window

data.name: SimpleLoginText
data.comment: Simple login label in the login window

data.name: NicknameText
data.comment: Nickname label in the login window

data.name: CountryLabel
data.comment: Country label in the login window

data.name: RankText
data.comment: Rank label in the login window

data.name: ClanText
data.comment: Clan label in the login window

data.name: ClanInfoText
data.value: Optional. If you do not have clan you can leave this empty.
data.comment: The text of the popup message when you click the "?" after ClanText in the login window

data.name: TusLoginText
data.comment: TUS login label in the login window

data.name: TusNicknameText
data.comment: TUS nickname label in the login window when TUS login is selected

data.name: TusPasswordText
data.comment: TUS password label in the login window when TUS login is selected

data.name: WhatIsTusLoginLabel
data.comment: What is TUS login? question in the login window when TUS login is selected

data.name: WhatIsTusLoginText
data.value: TUS is The Ultimate Site. It is a website for Worms: Armageddon, which has a lot of things for the game, such as: leagues, cups, tournaments, schemes, maps, forum, etc. It also supports snoopers. If you login with your TUS account into the snooper, then your rank will be your TUS league rank, your clan will also be set and you will be marked online on the website. You can also set a different nickname and a password for snooper login on TUS site in your Account Settings.
data.comment: The text of the popup message when What is TUS login? link is clicked

data.name: LogInText
data.comment: The label of the login button in the login window

data.name: WAExeNotFoundText
data.value: Ooops, it seems like Great Snooper could not find your WA.exe! You can not host or join a game without that file. Would you like to locate your WA.exe now? You can do it later in the settings too.
data.comment: The text of the popup message when Great Snooper could not locate WA.exe

data.name: WelcomeMessage
data.comment: Login window title and the welcome message in taskbar notification when you start Great Snooper

data.name: ServerMissingText
data.comment: The text of the popup message when server is not selected

data.name: NickEmptyText
data.comment: The text of the popup message when nickname is empty

data.name: NickStartsBad
data.value: Your nickname should begin with a character from the English aplhabet or with ` character!
data.comment: When nickname begins with wrong character (ex. 0Tomi)

data.name: NickHasBadChar
data.value: Your nickname contains one or more forbidden characters! Use characters from the English alphabet, numbers, - or `!
data.comment: When nickname contains any wrong character

data.name: ClanHasBadChar
data.value: Your clan can contain only characters from the English alphabet and numbers.
data.comment: When clan name contains any wrong character

data.name: TusNickEmptyText
data.comment: The title of the popup message when TUS password is empty

data.name: TusPasswordEmptyText
data.comment: The text of the popup message when TUS password is empty

data.name: TusLoginFailTitle
data.comment: The title of the popup message when TUS login fails due to caching that MonkeyIsland always forgets to correct

data.name: TusLoginFailText
data.value: An error occoured! Please try again!
data.comment: The text of the popup message when TUS login fails due to caching that MonkeyIsland always forgets to correct

data.name: TusAuthFailText
data.value: The given username or password was incorrent!
data.comment: The text of the popup message when TUS nickname or password is incorrect

data.name: TusCommFailText
data.value: The communication with tus-wa.com has failed. Please try again!
data.comment: The text of the popup message when communication with tus-wa.com fails

data.name: NicknameInUseText
data.value: This nickname is already in use! Please choose an other one! Note: if you lost your internet connection, you may need to wait 1 or 2 minutes until the server releases your broken nickname.
data.comment: The text of the popup message when the nickname is already in use on WormNet

data.name: WNCommFailText
data.value: Could not connect to the server! Check if the server address is correct or try again later (probably maintenance time)!
data.comment: The text of the popup message when connecting to WormNet fails

data.name: LanguageText
data.comment: Language label

data.name: LanguageChangedText
data.value: Please restart Great Snooper to apply new language settings everywhere!
data.comment: Notification message that the language data be updated after restart

data.name: ThemeText
data.comment: Theme label

data.name: JoinMessage
data.comment: When a user joins a channel (the message will begin with the name of the user)

data.name: PartMessage
data.comment: When a user lefts a channel (the message will begin with the name of the user)

data.name: PartMessage2
data.comment: When a user lefts a channel (the message will begin with the name of the user) with message\n{0} will be the message

data.name: WNQuitWOMessage
data.comment: When a user lefts WormNet without message

data.name: WNQuitWMessage
data.comment: When a user lefts WormNet with message\n{0} will be the message

data.name: GSQuitWOMessage
data.comment: When a user lefts Gamesurge server (where #worms channel can be found) without message

data.name: GSQuitWMessage
data.comment: When a user lefts Gamesurge server (where #worms channel can be found) with message\n{0} will be the message

data.name: OfflineMessage
data.comment: When the user tries to send a message to somebody who is offline\n{0} will be the name of the user

data.name: ServerErrorMessage
data.comment: Error message from WormNet (ex. You are banned, flooder!)\n{0} will be the error message

data.name: ServerQuitMessage
data.comment: When WormNet sends quit message for the user (same as error message above, but this time the server will terminate the connection)\n{0} will be the error message

data.name: PMPingTimeoutMessage
data.value: There may be messages that this user could not receive!
data.comment: When you send private message(s) to a user who has lost his/her connection then the snooper will send this notification message for you when he/she will drop (Ping timeout: 180 seconds)

data.name: HightLightMessage
data.comment: Highlight message in taskbar notification\n{0} will be the name of the channel where the user was highlighted

data.name: PMOnlineMessage
data.comment: Online message in private chat. When a player, who the user has private chat opened with, comes online (the message will begin with the name of the user, ex. "<nick> is online.")\nThe same message will be in taskbar notification too

data.name: OnlineMessage
data.comment: Online message in taskbar notification (when a buddy joins)\n{0} will be the nick of the user

data.name: NotifOnlineMessage
data.comment: Online message for notificator (when you are looking for somebody)\n{0} will be the nick of the user\n{1} will be the name of the channel where the user joined

data.name: GSNicknameInUse
data.value: The selected nickname is already in use!
data.comment: When the user tries to change his/her nickname in #worms channel on GameSurge with command "/nick <newnick>" but <newnick> is already in use

data.name: GSNicknameChange
data.comment: When a player changes his/her name in #worms channel on GameSurge\n{0} will be the old nick of the player\n{1} will be the new nick of the player

data.name: ConversationAdded
data.comment: When a player adds somebody to the conversation\n{0} will be the nick of the player who adds somebody to the conversation\n{1} will be the nick of the player who is being added to the conversation

data.name: ConversationRemoved
data.comment: When a player removes somebody from the conversation\n{0} will be the nick of the player who removes somebody from the conversation\n{1} will be the nick of the player who is being removed from the conversation

data.name: ConversationKick
data.value: You have been removed from this conversation.
data.comment: When the snooper user is removed from a conversation

data.name: ConversationLeave
data.comment: When somebody leaves the conversation\n{0} will be the nick of the player who left the conversation

data.comment: The text of the popup message when WA.exe is not set

data.comment: The text of the popup message when WA.exe doesn't exist

data.name: UsingWormNat2
data.comment: Using WormNat2? question

data.name: AboutWormNat2Text
data.value: About WormNat 2: If you host with the game, then it will create the server on your computer and it will wait for players to join on a specified port (usually 17011). But most of the routers and firewall programs don't allow incoming connections, so nobody can join your game. You will need to enable port forwarding on your router and/or configure your firewall if you use one in order to let players join your game. WormNat2 uses a technique, that you can host games without incoming connections so your host will work properly. To make this possible it uses a dedicated proxy server, which actually handles all the connections. But since there is no support for other proxy servers, we would much rather that you configure your system to use normal way of hosting your games and use WormNat2 only if nothing else works so the proxy server will not be overloaded. Enable loading WormKit modules are NOT needed to use WormNat2 hosting feature of the snooper!
data.comment: The text of the popup message when About WormNat2 is clicked

data.name: NotificatorHelpLabel
data.comment: Notificator help label

data.name: NotificatorHelpText
data.value: Notificator can look for words in messages, sender names, hoster names, game names and join messages. By default it will look for whole words, but you can use special characters '*', '+', and '.'. '*' matches any character, '+' matches at least 1 character and '.' matches only 1 character. So if you are looking for words similar to "example" then you can search for it as "example", "*ample", "examp*", "*amp*", "e.ample", "+amp+", etc. You can add one word per line. If you would like to ignore a word from searching then delete it or write '#' before it like "#example".
data.comment: Notificator help text
